message: My new blog post about handling Unix user defined signals. The examples are in Go but you can implement it in any programming language. I would love to hear your feedback, comments or questions.
story: Muhammad Bassem shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Handling User Defined Signals in Go
caption: blog.mbassem.com
description: Signals represent a limited form of inter-process communication that is used to interrupt the execution of a certain program to execute a predefined handler. In this post, we are interested in the user-defined signals "USR1" and "USR2". Those signals are there for you to define their handlers. I'llâ€¦
